page.title: 09HOLY WELL SCHOOL
page.content: { HOLY WELL SCHOOL { After we had been to visit Tawstock church we went to{Holy Well}primary school. When we got there we saw that the roof of the school was thatched it looked lovely but it could easily catch fire. We were told that the school was built in 1830 but there was a fire that burnt all the thatched roof in 1939 but fortunately it was replaced just as it was before.{Holy {Well}school is very small and has room for fifty children but at the moment there are only thirty five children. The playground is very small but it is big enough for the few children who use it. After our visit to the school we started the journey back to our school.
